name: English Listening & Speaking Practice
shortDesc: Improve your fluency and pronunciation in real situations.
longDesc: Daily practice with conversations, pronunciation drills, and role-play activities to boost confidence and fluency.

name: TOEIC Test Preparation
shortDesc: Prepare for the TOEIC exam with practice tests and tips.
longDesc: Includes vocabulary building, grammar review, and timed practice tests modeled on the official TOEIC format.

name: Advanced English Writing
shortDesc: Write essays, reports, and emails with precision.
longDesc: Learn to write clearly and professionally, using academic and workplace formats. Peer review and tutor feedback included.
